bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🏤 档案,🎊 常用
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=')) {
    Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
    var list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
    var user = list.screenname;
    var fav = String(list.itemname);
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_1", fav.replace(/@/, 'fav-'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_2", fav.replace(/@/, '%40'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
} else {
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1",'');
}
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(Account && String(Account).length > 0) {
    let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    Fav1 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_1");
    Fav2 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_2");
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
MY = Get('my');
for (i in MY) {
    let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨书籍✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部文本', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}texts${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}texts?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部书籍', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}books${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}books?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
TEXT = Get('text');
for (i in TEXT) {
    let title = TEXT[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = TEXT[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨视频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部视频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}movies${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}movies?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
VIDEO = Get('video');
for (i in VIDEO) {
    let title = VIDEO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = VIDEO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨音频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}audio${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}audio?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音乐', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}etree${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}etree?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
AUDIO = Get('audio');
for (i in AUDIO) {
    let title = AUDIO[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = AUDIO[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨图像✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部图像', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}image${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}image?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
IMAGE = Get('image');
for (i in IMAGE) {
    let title = IMAGE[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = IMAGE[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = (source.getLoginInfoMap() && source.getLoginInfoMap()["代理："]) ? source.getLoginInfoMap()["代理："].split(",") : [];
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { if (cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl) && /collection/.test(cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl))) { result =''; } if (cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl) && cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl).includes('texts')) { if (!result.includes('js-iaux-pdfs') && java.get('FDF' + baseUrl) == 'n') { if (String(chapter).includes('isVip=true')) { java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl, book.durChapterTitle).body()); var bookid = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.*\//, ''); var action = 'action'; var identifier = 'identifier'; var requestBody = `------WebKitFormBoundary Content-Disposition: form-data; name=${action} create_token ------WebKitFormBoundary Content-Disposition: form-data; name=${identifier} ${bookid} ------WebKitFormBoundary `; var headers = {"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundary"}; var option = { "method": "POST", "body": String(requestBody), "headers": headers }; let url = Get('url') + '/services/loans/loan,' + JSON.stringify(option); let res = java.ajax(url); let token = JSON.parse(res).token; let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl); let loan = cookie.getKey(baseUrl,'loan-' + bookid); ck = String(ck).replace(loan, token); cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl) cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck}`); } var readurl = 'https:' + JSON.parse(java.getElements('.js-bookreader').attr('value')).url; var read = java.ajax(readurl); var list = JSON.parse(read).data.brOptions.data; var allURIs = []; list.forEach(pageGroup => { pageGroup.forEach(page => { allURIs.push(page.uri); }); }); var result = ''; for(i in list){ imgurl = allURIs[i]; if (/.jp2/.test(imgurl)) { match = allURIs[i].match(/(.*)(\&file=.*)(\&id=.*)/); imgurl = match[1] + match[3] + match[2]; } result +='\n'; } } else { var start = cache.get(book.name + baseUrl); if (start == 'y') { java.startBrowser(baseUrl, book.durChapterTitle); } else { java.toast('【PDF下载提示】\nㅤ\n❤️网页下载PDF❤️'); } cache.put(book.name + baseUrl, 'y'); result ='\n'; } } if (cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl) && /movies/.test(cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl))) { if (source.bookSourceType !== 1) { if (baseUrl.includes('movies') || baseUrl.includes('TV3')) { var start = Get('q') == 0 ? cache.get(book.name + baseUrl) : 'y'; if (java.get('Video' + baseUrl) && start == 'y') { java.startBrowser(java.get('Video' + baseUrl), book.durChapterTitle); } else { java.toast('【播放提示】\nㅤ\n❤️刷新开始播放❤️'); } cache.put(book.name + baseUrl, 'y'); result ='\n' + (java.get('Intro' + baseUrl) ? java.get('Intro' + baseUrl) : ''); } else { java.toast('【播放提示】\nㅤ\n♣️视频没有播放链接♣️'); result ='\n'; } } else { result; } } if (cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl) && /audio|etree/.test(cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl))) { if (source.bookSourceType !== 1) { var start = Get('q') == 0 ? cache.get(book.name + baseUrl) : 'y'; if (java.get('Audio' + baseUrl) && start == 'y') { java.startBrowser(java.get('Audio' + baseUrl), book.durChapterTitle); } else { java.toast('【播放提示】\nㅤ\n❤️刷新开始播放❤️'); } cache.put(book.name + baseUrl, 'y'); result =''; } else { result; } } if (cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl) && /image/.test(cache.get('Type' + book.bookUrl))) { var list = java.getElements('.carousel-image-wrapper'); var result = ''; for(i in list){ result +='\n'; } } } else { '
'; }

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var client_url = 'https://archive.org/search?query=' + e + '&sort=' + get('sort',Get('p'));
    return Get('url') + '/services/search/beta/page_production/?user_query=' + java.encodeURI(e) + '&hits_per_page=100&page={{page}}&filter_map=' + filter_map('s') + get('sort_1',Get('p')) + '&aggregations=false&client_url=' + java.encodeURI(client_url);
}(key));
</js>
